overview:
John Wecker Carpet Cleaning is a full service, St. Louis based, carpet cleaning company. The services provided are, but not limited to: Steam/Shampoo, Stains/Spot Removal, Sanitizing/Disinfecting, Allergy Relief, All-Natural Organic Process, Odor Removal, Deodorizing, Stain Protector/Scotchguard, Upholstery Cleaning Sofas, Loveseats, Armchairs, Chairs (Any Size or Shape), Ottomans and Chaise-Lounges, Upholstered Walls, and:

Leather Cleaning Ceramic Tile and Grout Cleaning Truck-Mounted System State-of-the-Art Equipment Drier Carpet 230-Degree Heater System Means Cleaner Carpet Satisfaction Guaranteed
